creator: guldor@laposte.net
text:
(Nightly 10-oct-2002)
URLRewritingModifier doesn't work if other fields between name and value attributes
ex: value="1234" foo="bar" name="sessionId"
The value retrieved for sessionId is  '1234" foo='
(Modified RegExp .* with [^\"]* in function setArgumentName and it works OK for me)

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
